assertion.value: KI received grants from Novartis Pharma K.K., Japan Blood Product Organization, Kyowa Hakko Kirion Co., Ltd, JCR Pharmaceuticals Co., Ltd, AbbVie Inc., Genzyme Japan K.K., Teijin Pharma Ltd, Daiichi Sankyo Co., Ltd, and Miyarisan Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd, and lecture fees from Kyowa Hakko Kirin Co., Ltd, Astellas Pharma Inc., Pfizer Japan Inc., Asahi Kasei Pharma Corp., Kowa Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd, Merck Sharp & Dohme Corp., Alexion, Meiji Seika Pharma Co., Ltd, and Novartis Pharma K.K.. KI is also an advisor for Zenyaku Kogyo Co., Ltd.
